Can only cancel minion cards played from the hand in the normal fashion (eg. not weapons played via {Disguised Weapon} or allies via {Piper}).
Can be used to cancel all action cards, including employ retainer, recruit ally and political action.
Cancelation must be immediate: a wake can be used in the "as played" window, but a reaction to "unlock and attempt to block" cannot.

[VIS]If a limited effect is canceled (bleed, additional strike), then the limit is not triggered and another limited effect can be used.
[VIS]If an action is canceled, it is not performed and the minion is free to attempt the same action again.
[VIS]Can only cancel minion cards played from the hand in the normal fashion (eg. not weapons played via {Disguised Weapon} or allies via {Piper}).
[VIS]Can be used to cancel all action cards, including employ retainer, recruit ally and political action.
[VIS]Cancelation must be immediate: a wake can be used in the "as played" window, but a reaction to "unlock and attempt to block" cannot.
